summary: This document is a daily lieutenant's log from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, NY, dated July 17, 2019. It details routine prison operations, inmate counts, movements, and security checks. The log shows inmate Paul Manafort was transferred out of the facility that morning, and notes several inmates on psychological observation or suicide watch.

events.title: Paul Manafort transferred from MCC
events.description: Inmate Paul Manafort (registration #35207-016) was transferred out of the Metropolitan Correctional Center (from ES to HLD Remove) at 7:26 AM.

events.title: Inmate placed in Administrative Detention
events.description: Inmate Gouldbourne (registration #23152-014) was moved to unit ZA and placed in Administrative Detention at 8:15 PM pending an investigation.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: This is a routine prison operations log from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for July 17, 2019.
The log records the transfer of inmate Paul Manafort out of the facility at 7:26 AM.
Several inmates are noted as being on psychological observation or suicide watch with an inmate companion.
One inmate (Gouldbourne) was placed in Administrative Detention pending investigation.
The document shows standard prison procedures including multiple inmate counts, security checks, and inmate movements between units.
